title: Bodoni examples, specimens, uses, anything...
content:
I have assignement for my typography class and I have to make Bodoni type specimen.  
So if you have any example of how Bodoni is used, papers, posters, magazines etc. , old specimens, specimens in pdf. Please help.

I have already made specimen but it was not good enough, format, paper, colors and so on.  
In the end he gave as incomplete task, so 20 hours of work were lost.

S.O.S HELP MAYDAY.
author: sandrosandro

comments.content:
You can start (or finish) with this : [http://www.octavo.com/editions/bodtip](http://web.archive.org/web/20131113185222/http:/www.octavo.com/editions/bodtip "http://www.octavo.com/editions/bodtip")  
Here is the poster by bibliophile Corrado Mingardi for 2005 Parma exhibit :  
 [http://www.as8.it/type/bodoni/05\_poster\_napoleone\_&\_bodoni.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131113185222/http:/www.as8.it/type/bodoni/05_poster_napoleone_&_bodoni.jpg "http://www.as8.it/type/bodoni/05\_poster\_napoleone\_&\_bodoni.jpg")

Thanks, thanks. You don't know how I appreciate this.

Keep'em coming.
BJHARVEY you think that I haven't searched that? It is ridiculous to post something like that.

Ravel, you apparantly haven't been around here for long. Otherwise you'd know that a lot of lazy students post here and hope that Typophiles help them do their assignments.  
Chill, ok?

Bert Vanderveen BNO

Ravel, have you tried doing a Google Image Search of the word "Bodoni"? You get pages and pages of exactly what you ask for in your first post. And yes, you do realize that you're essentially asking Typophiles to do your homework for you, right?
